card.name: Bloody Shadow, Mystic Light Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you cast a spell this turn, you may summon this creature for no cost. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature, ignore any effects that prevent your other creatures from attacking your opponent this turn. (Effects such as summoning sickness and "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players" are ignored. However, this effect doesn't let you attack creatures.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Race
property.value: Arc Seraphim/Origin

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ During your opponent's turn, each of your other creatures gets +2000 power. ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Each of your shield cards put into your hand get "shield trigger" until the end of your turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your creatures that has Cyber in its race. {SOULSHIFT} (When you summon this creature, this creature's cost is reduced by the base creature's cost. However, it can't cost less than 1.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Players can't cast spells that have the same civilization as a spell in their graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Lord/Origin

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has Cyber in its race or one of your Origins. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD PLUS} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add the top card of your deck under one of your shields face down. (Each card stack is still considered to be one shield.)) ■ When you use this creature's "Shield Plus" ability, look at that shield and put a card from that stack on the top of your deck.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent discards all cards from his hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger".

property.name: Set

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your evolution creatures in the battle zone. If you do, search your deck and you may take up to 2 creatures from your deck, show them to your opponent, and put them under the chosen evolution creature. Then shuffle your deck.
